creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
description: groups of grey, white, and black horses tethered to poles standing in tall grasses; in front, two men begin leading a horse away from the group; a cluster of people congregate around a tall tree at center; village rooftops and a tree in background at R

title: Chiryu, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
